card.name: Allied Strategies
card.text: Domain - Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands he or she controls.

card.name: Alpha Kavu
card.text: {1}{G}: Target Kavu creature gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Amphibious Kavu
card.text: Whenever Amphibious Kavu blocks or becomes blocked by one or more blue and/or black creatures, Amphibious Kavu gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Ancient Spider
card.text: First strike; reach

card.name: Arctic Merfolk
card.text: Kicker - Return a creature you control to its owner's hand. If Arctic Merfolk was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Aura Blast
card.text: Destroy target enchantment. Draw a card.

card.name: Aurora Griffin
card.text: Flying {W}: Target permanent becomes white until end of turn.

card.name: Bog Down
card.text: Kicker - Sacrifice two lands. Target player discards two cards. If Bog Down was kicked, that player discards three cards instead.

card.name: Caldera Kavu
card.text: {1}{B}: Caldera Kavu gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {G}: Caldera Kavu becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Cavern Harpy
card.text: Flying When Cavern Harpy enters the battlefield, return a blue or black creature you control to its owner's hand. Pay 1 life: Return Cavern Harpy to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cloud Cover
card.text: Whenever another permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may return that permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Confound
card.text: Counter target spell that targets one or more creatures. Draw a card.

card.name: Crosis's Catacombs
card.text: When Crosis's Catacombs enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Crosis's Charm
card.text: Choose one - Return target permanent to its owner's hand; or destroy target nonblack creature, and it can't be regenerated; or destroy target artifact.

card.name: Darigaaz's Caldera
card.text: When Darigaaz's Caldera enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Darigaaz's Charm
card.text: Choose one - Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand; or Darigaaz's Charm deals 3 damage to target creature or player; or target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Daring Leap
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Dark Suspicions
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player loses X life, where X is the number of cards in that player's hand minus the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Deadapult
card.text: {R}, Sacrifice a Zombie: Deadapult deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Death Bomb
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Death Bomb, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Destructive Flow
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a nonbasic land.

card.name: Diabolic Intent
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Diabolic Intent, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Disciple of Kangee
card.text: {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying and becomes blue until end of turn.

card.name: Dominaria's Judgment
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain protection from white if you control a Plains, from blue if you control an Island, from black if you control a Swamp, from red if you control a Mountain, and from green if you control a Forest.

card.name: Doomsday Specter
card.text: Flying When Doomsday Specter enters the battlefield, return a blue or black creature you control to its owner's hand. Whenever Doomsday Specter deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand and choose a card from it. The player discards that card.

card.name: Draco
card.text: Domain - Draco costs {2} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control. Flying Domain - At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Draco unless you pay {10}. This cost is reduced by {2} for each basic land type among lands you control.

card.name: Dralnu's Crusade
card.text: Goblin creatures get +1/+1. All Goblins are black and are Zombies in addition to their other creature types.

card.name: Dralnu's Pet
card.text: Kicker - {2}{B}, Discard a creature card. If Dralnu's Pet was kicked, it enters the battlefield with flying and with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Dromar's Cavern
card.text: When Dromar's Cavern enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Dromar's Charm
card.text: Choose one - You gain 5 life; or counter target spell; or target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Eladamri's Call
card.text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ertai, the Corrupted
card.text: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature or enchantment: Counter target spell.

card.name: Ertai's Trickery
card.text: Counter target spell if it was kicked.

card.name: Escape Routes
card.text: {2}{U}: Return target white or black creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Exotic Disease
card.text: Domain - Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Falling Timber
card.text: Kicker - Sacrifice a land. Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn. If Falling Timber was kicked, prevent all combat damage another target creature would deal this turn.

card.name: Flametongue Kavu
card.text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Fleetfoot Panther
card.text: Flash When Fleetfoot Panther enters the battlefield, return a green or white creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Forsaken City
card.text: Forsaken City doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a card from your hand. If you do, untap Forsaken City. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Gaea's Herald
card.text: Creature spells can't be countered.

card.name: Gaea's Might
card.text: Domain - Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

card.name: Gainsay
card.text: Counter target blue spell.

card.name: Gerrard's Command
card.text: Untap target creature. It gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin Game
card.text: Each player hides at least one item, then all players reveal them simultaneously. Each player loses life equal to the number of items he or she revealed. The player who revealed the fewest items then loses half his or her life, rounded up. If two or more players are tied for fewest, each loses half his or her life, rounded up.

card.name: Guard Dogs
card.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Choose a permanent you control. Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn if it shares a color with that permanent.

card.name: Heroic Defiance
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 unless it shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common.

card.name: Hobble
card.text: Enchant creature When Hobble enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature can't attack. Enchanted creature can't block if it's black.

card.name: Honorable Scout
card.text: When Honorable Scout enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each black and/or red creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Horned Kavu
card.text: When Horned Kavu enters the battlefield, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Hull Breach
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target artifact; or destroy target enchantment; or destroy target artifact and target enchantment.

card.name: Hunting Drake
card.text: Flying When Hunting Drake enters the battlefield, put target red or green creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Implode
card.text: Destroy target land. Draw a card.

card.name: Insolence
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, Insolence deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Kavu Recluse
card.text: {T}: Target land becomes a Forest until end of turn.

card.name: Keldon Mantle
card.text: Enchant creature {B}: Regenerate enchanted creature. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {G}: Enchanted creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Keldon Twilight
card.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, if no creatures attacked this turn, that player sacrifices a creature he or she controlled since the beginning of the turn.

card.name: Lashknife Barrier
card.text: When Lashknife Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card. If a source would deal damage to a creature you control, it deals that much damage minus 1 to that creature instead.

card.name: Lava Zombie
card.text: When Lava Zombie enters the battlefield, return a black or red creature you control to its owner's hand. {2}: Lava Zombie gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Lord of the Undead
card.text: Other Zombie creatures get +1/+1. {1}{B}, {T}: Return target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Maggot Carrier
card.text: When Maggot Carrier enters the battlefield, each player loses 1 life.

card.name: Magma Burst
card.text: Kicker - Sacrifice two lands. Magma Burst deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If Magma Burst was kicked, it deals 3 damage to another target creature or player.

card.name: Magnigoth Treefolk
card.text: Domain - For each basic land type among lands you control, Magnigoth Treefolk has landwalk of that type.

card.name: Malicious Advice
card.text: Tap X target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands. You lose X life.

card.name: Mana Cylix
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: March of Souls
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Marsh Crocodile
card.text: When Marsh Crocodile enters the battlefield, return a blue or black creature you control to its owner's hand. When Marsh Crocodile enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.

card.name: Meddling Mage
card.text: As Meddling Mage enters the battlefield, name a nonland card. The named card can't be cast.

card.name: Meteor Crater
card.text: {T}: Choose a color of a permanent you control. Add one mana of that color to your mana pool.

card.name: Mire Kavu
card.text: Mire Kavu gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Swamp.

card.name: Mirrorwood Treefolk
card.text: {2}{R}{W}: The next time damage would be dealt to Mirrorwood Treefolk this turn, that damage is dealt to target creature or player instead.

card.name: Mogg Jailer
card.text: Mogg Jailer can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 2 or less.

card.name: Mogg Sentry
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Mogg Sentry gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Morgue Toad
card.text: Sacrifice Morgue Toad: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Multani's Harmony
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Natural Emergence
card.text: When Natural Emergence enters the battlefield, return a red or green enchantment you control to its owner's hand. Lands you control are 2/2 creatures with first strike. They're still lands.

card.name: Nemata, Grove Guardian
card.text: {2}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield. Sacrifice a Saproling: Saproling creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Nightscape Battlemage
Nightscape Familiar
card.text: Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.

card.name: Noxious Vapors
card.text: Each player reveals his or her hand and chooses one card of each color from it, then discards all other nonland cards.

card.name: Orim's Chant
Phyrexian Bloodstock
card.text: When Phyrexian Bloodstock leaves the battlefield, destroy target white creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Phyrexian Scuta
card.text: Kicker - Pay 3 life. If Phyrexian Scuta was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Phyrexian Tyranny
card.text: Whenever a player draws a card, that player loses 2 life unless he or she pays {2}.

card.name: Planar Overlay
card.text: Each player chooses a land he or she controls of each basic land type. Return those lands to their owners' hands.

card.name: Planeswalker's Favor
card.text: {3}{G}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from his or her hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Planeswalker's Fury
card.text: {3}{R}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from his or her hand. Planeswalker's Fury deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that player. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Planeswalker's Mirth
card.text: {3}{W}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from his or her hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Planeswalker's Mischief
card.text: {3}{U}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from his or her hand. If it's an instant or sorcery card, exile it. You may cast it without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled. At the beginning of the next end step, if you haven't cast it, return it to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Planeswalker's Scorn
card.text: {3}{B}: Target opponent reveals a card at random from his or her hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Pollen Remedy
card.text: Kicker - Sacrifice a land. Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose. If Pollen Remedy was kicked, prevent the next 6 damage this way instead.

card.name: Primal Growth
card.text: Kicker - Sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. If Primal Growth was kicked, instead search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Pygmy Kavu
card.text: When Pygmy Kavu enters the battlefield, draw a card for each black creature your opponents control.

card.name: Questing Phelddagrif
card.text: {G}: Questing Phelddagrif gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Target opponent puts a 1/1 green Hippo creature token onto the battlefield. {W}: Questing Phelddagrif gains protection from black and from red until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life. {U}: Questing Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent may draw a card.

card.name: Quirion Dryad
card.text: Whenever you cast a white, blue, black, or red spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Quirion Dryad.

card.name: Quirion Explorer
card.text: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

card.name: Radiant Kavu
card.text: {R}{G}{W}: Prevent all combat damage blue creatures and black creatures would deal this turn.

card.name: Razing Snidd
card.text: When Razing Snidd enters the battlefield, return a black or red creature you control to its owner's hand. When Razing Snidd enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a land.

card.name: Rith's Charm
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target nonbasic land; or put three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield; or prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

card.name: Rith's Grove
card.text: When Rith's Grove enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Root Greevil
card.text: {2}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Root Greevil: Destroy all enchantments of the color of your choice.

card.name: Rushing River
card.text: Kicker - Sacrifice a land. Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If Rushing River was kicked, return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Samite Elder
card.text: {T}: Creatures you control gain protection from the colors of target permanent you control until end of turn.

card.name: Samite Pilgrim
card.text: Domain - {T}: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

card.name: Sawtooth Loon
card.text: Flying When Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand. When Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Sea Snidd
card.text: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Shifting Sky
card.text: As Shifting Sky enters the battlefield, choose a color. All nonland permanents are the chosen color.

card.name: Shivan Wurm
card.text: Trample When Shivan Wurm enters the battlefield, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Shriek of Dread
card.text: Target creature gains fear until end of turn.

card.name: Silver Drake
card.text: Flying When Silver Drake enters the battlefield, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Singe
card.text: Singe deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature becomes black until end of turn.

card.name: Sinister Strength
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+1 and is black.

card.name: Sisay's Ingenuity
card.text: Enchant creature When Sisay's Ingenuity enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has "{2}{U}: Target creature becomes the color of your choice until end of turn."

card.name: Skyship Weatherlight
card.text: When Skyship Weatherlight enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of artifact and/or creature cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library. {4}, {T}: Choose a card at random that was exiled with Skyship Weatherlight. Put that card into its owner's hand.

card.name: Skyshroud Blessing
card.text: Lands gain shroud until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Slay
card.text: Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

card.name: Sleeping Potion
card.text: Enchant creature When Sleeping Potion enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice Sleeping Potion.

card.name: Slingshot Goblin
card.text: {R}, {T}: Slingshot Goblin deals 2 damage to target blue creature.

card.name: Sparkcaster
card.text: When Sparkcaster enters the battlefield, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand. When Sparkcaster enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player.

card.name: Star Compass
card.text: Star Compass enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.

card.name: Steel Leaf Paladin
card.text: First strike When Steel Leaf Paladin enters the battlefield, return a green or white creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Stone Kavu
card.text: {R}: Stone Kavu gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {W}: Stone Kavu gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Stormscape Battlemage
Stormscape Familiar
card.text: Flying White spells and black spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Strafe
card.text: Strafe deals 3 damage to target nonred creature.

card.name: Stratadon
card.text: Domain - Stratadon costs {1} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control. Trample

card.name: Sunken Hope
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sunscape Battlemage
Sunscape Familiar
card.text: Defender Green spells and blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Surprise Deployment
card.text: Cast Surprise Deployment only during combat. You may put a nonwhite creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. At the beginning of the next end step, return that creature to your hand.

card.name: Tahngarth, Talruum Hero
card.text: Vigilance {1}{R}, {T}: Tahngarth, Talruum Hero deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Tahngarth.

card.name: Terminal Moraine
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terminal Moraine: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Terminate
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Thornscape Battlemage
Thornscape Familiar
card.text: Red spells and white spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Thunderscape Battlemage
Thunderscape Familiar
card.text: First strike Black spells and green spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Treva's Charm
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target enchantment; or exile target attacking creature; or draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Treva's Ruins
card.text: When Treva's Ruins enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Urza's Guilt
card.text: Each player draws two cards, then discards three cards, then loses 4 life.

card.name: Voice of All
card.text: Flying As Voice of All enters the battlefield, choose a color. Voice of All has protection from the chosen color.

card.name: Volcano Imp
card.text: Flying {1}{R}: Volcano Imp gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Warped Devotion
card.text: Whenever a permanent is returned to a player's hand, that player discards a card.

card.name: Waterspout Elemental
